components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Twilio Debugger. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue in Increasing consumer lag on connect-devtools.debugevents-to-es-dp-elasticsearch-gateway-debugevents. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays To Fastweb and Wind Tre networks in Italy

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages To Fastweb and Wind Tre networks in Italy. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Issues With Onboarding New Numbers or Deprovisioning 10DLC Numbers

incident_updates.body: We continue to investigate delays when trying to onboard new numbers, or de-provisioning numbers on T-Mobile 10DLC A2P. We expect to provide another update on July 12th at 17:56 PT or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: A subset of small US networks in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 06 July 2023 at 08:00 PDT until 06 July 2023 at 10:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US carriers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Portugal Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner is conducting a maintenance from 06 July 2023 at 15:00 PDT until 06 July 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be call drops to a subset of Twilio Portugal phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - T-Mobile

incident_updates.body: The T-Mobile network in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 06 July 2023 at 18:00 PDT until 07 July 2023 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from T-Mobile US handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Malaysia SMS Carrier Maintenance - U Mobile

incident_updates.body: The U Mobile network in Malaysia is conducting a planned maintenance from 07 July 2023 at 09:00 PDT until 07 July 2023 at 13:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from U Mobile Malaysia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Malaysia SMS Carrier Maintenance - ONE XOX

incident_updates.body: The ONE XOX network in Malaysia is conducting a planned  maintenance from 07 July 2023 at 09:00 PDT until 07 July 2023 at 13:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from ONE XOX Malaysia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance - Multiple Countries

incident_updates.body:
Our SMS Carrier Partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 07 July 2023 at 12:00 PDT until 07 July 2023 at 16:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to multiple countries as shown below.

Region: Asia
Afghanistan
Indonesia
Myanmar
Philippines
Taiwan
Uzbekistan

Region: Africa
Algeria
Congo Democratic Republic
Ethiopia
Gabon
Ivory Coast
Rwanda
Sudan
Tunisia
Uganda

Region: Europe
Belarus
Kyrgyzstan
Ukraine

Region: South America
Argentina
Bolivia

scheduled_maintenances.name: Belarus SMS Carrier Maintenance - A1, MTS, Life

incident_updates.body: The A1, MTS and Life Network in Belarus is conducting a planned maintenance from 10 July 2023 at 15:00 PDT until 10 July 2023 at 20:00 PDT. During the maintenance window. There could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from A1, MTS and Life handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: A subset of small US networks in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 11 July 2023 at 2:00 PDT until 11 July 2023 at 4:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US Carriers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada SMS and MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in the US and Canada is conducting planned maintenance from 12 July 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 13 July 2023 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US and Canada handsets via Toll-free numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Mexico SMS Carrier Maintenance - AT&T

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The AT&T network in Mexico is conducting an emergency maintenance from 05 July 2023 at 23:00 PDT until 06 July 2023 at 05:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T Mexico handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our Carrier Partner Verizon Wireless US is conducting a planned maintenance from 05 July 2023 at 19:00 PDT until 06 July 2023 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Verizon Wireless US customers.
Impacted Products: SNA, Lookup SIM Swap and Identity Match

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our Global Carrier Partner Three UK is conducting a planned maintenance 04 July 2023 at 21:30 PDT until 07 July 2023 at 10:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three UK customers.
Impacted Products: Silent Network Authentication (SNA), Lookup SIM Swap, Identity Match

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

04 July 2023 at 21:30 PDT until 05 July 2023 at 10:30 PDT
05 July 2023 at 21:30 PDT until 06 July 2023 at 10:30 PDT
06 July 2023 at 21:30 PDT until 07 July 2023 at 10:30 PDT

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

scheduled_maintenances.name: Iraq SMS Carrier Maintenance - Zain

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Zain network in Iraq is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 26 July 2023 at 18:00 PDT until 14 July 2023 at 22:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Zain Iraq handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

26 June 2023 at 18:00 PDT until 26 June 2023 at 22:00 PDT
03 July 2023 at 18:00 PDT until 03 July 2023 at 22:00 PDT
04 July 2023 at 18:00 PDT until 04 July 2023 at 22:00 PDT
